Question: In June 1994, robotic cameras were installed at WXRK studios to film The ____ Show for a condensed, half-hour show on E!.
Hints: This person left WCCC a year later after he was denied a pay increase.
Originally set for a 2000 release, this person starred as Orinthal, a family dog.
A settlement was reached in 1999 with this person receiving $50,000.
